Name: Candiear
Details: An unremarkable Canopian colony during the Star League years, until a lack of raw materials caused the Magistracy to invest extensively into expanding its mining operations, with limited success. Candiear's mining culture and live music bars have also spawned several Periphery underground music bands known through the Inner Sphere, such as The LÃ¶yly, Dark Khaos, Sancho's Panzers, Uncle Cid or the Marksmen.
